titles.title: Congratulating the National Treasury Employees Union on its 85th anniversary and commending the dedication shown Federal employees and continued service provided by the National Treasury Employees Union and the members of the National Treasury Employees Union.

Congratulating the National Treasury Employees Union on its 85th anniversary and commending the dedication shown Federal employees and continued service provided by the National Treasury Employees Union and the members of the National Treasury Employees Union.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Accountability.

bill.summary: This resolution congratulates the National Treasury Employees Union on its 85th anniversary and commends the members of the union for their contributions to the United States.
